name: Opacity Zero
description:
Welcome to Opacity Zero

Run, Sprint and Parkour your way through 5 Unique Levels Skilfully!!

Current game is in DEVELOPMENT this is the demo release and will be updated frequently so check back for new content, features and bug fixes.

Planned Updates:

4 more level based on unique eye catching themes

A hidden collectibles system

Save Position System

Please note 

This is my first game :) 

any feedback or responses will be taken with open arms.
